languages.text: "Конечно, Ваша Светлость... Вдруг вы придете к выводу, что ваша почтенная спутница и так достаточно облагодетельствована дружбой с вами".
"Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is every possibility that you will come to the conclusion that your esteemed companion has already benefited plenty from your friendship."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, Ваша Светлость... Вдруг вы придете к выводу, что ваша почтенная спутница и так достаточно облагодетельствована дружбой с вами".

traits.locale_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is every possibility that you will come to the conclusion that your esteemed companion has already benefited plenty from your friendship."
"Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is every possibility that you will come to the conclusion that your esteemed companion has already benefited plenty from your friendship."
"Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is every possibility that you will come to the conclusion that your esteemed companion has already benefited plenty from your friendship."

"Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is every possibility that you will come to the conclusion that your esteemed companion has already benefited plenty from your friendship."
"Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is every possibility that you will come to the conclusion that your esteemed companion has already benefited plenty from your friendship."

languages.text: "Natürlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es kann ja durchaus sein, dass Ihr zu dem Schluss gelangt, Eure geschätzte Gefährtin hätte bereits genügend von Eurer Freundschaft profitiert."
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is every possibility that you will come to the conclusion that your esteemed companion has already benefited plenty from your friendship."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es kann ja durchaus sein, dass Ihr zu dem Schluss gelangt, Eure geschätzte Gefährtin hätte bereits genügend von Eurer Freundschaft profitiert."

languages.text: « Bien entendu, Votre Seigneurie. Il y a de fortes chances que vous arriviez à la conclusion que votre honorable amie a déjà suffisamment profité de votre amitié. »
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is every possibility that you will come to the conclusion that your esteemed companion has already benefited plenty from your friendship."

traits.locale_text: « Bien entendu, Votre Seigneurie. Il y a de fortes chances que vous arriviez à la conclusion que votre honorable amie a déjà suffisamment profité de votre amitié. »

languages.text: “当然没问题，大人。或许您会得出这样的结论——光是您的友谊，就已经让您尊贵的伙伴受益良多。”
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is every possibility that you will come to the conclusion that your esteemed companion has already benefited plenty from your friendship."

traits.locale_text: “当然没问题，大人。或许您会得出这样的结论——光是您的友谊，就已经让您尊贵的伙伴受益良多。”

languages.text: 「かしこまりました、陛下。あなた様との友情だけで十分とお考えに至る可能性もありますからな」
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is every possibility that you will come to the conclusion that your esteemed companion has already benefited plenty from your friendship."

traits.locale_text: 「かしこまりました、陛下。大切なお仲間が、既にあなたとの友情から多くのものを得ているとお考えになるのももっともです」

languages.text: «Por supuesto, {mf|milord|milady}. También existe la posibilidad de que considere que su estimada compañera se haya beneficiado de su amistad en la medida suficiente».
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is every possibility that you will come to the conclusion that your esteemed companion has already benefited plenty from your friendship."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto, {mf|milord|milady}. También existe la posibilidad de que considere que su estimada compañera se haya beneficiado de su amistad en la medida suficiente».

languages.text: "Tabii {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Değerli yoldaşınızın, dostluğunuzdan zaten fazlasıyla nasiplendiği sonucuna varmanız kuvvetle muhtemel."
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. There is every possibility that you will come to the conclusion that your esteemed companion has already benefited plenty from your friendship."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Değerli yoldaşınızın, dostluğunuzdan zaten fazlasıyla nasiplendiği sonucuna varmanız kuvvetle muhtemel."
